global.siteDescription: A Web Portfolio for Al Evan Castillo

blocks.body:
## Hi! My name is Al Evan Castillo

I'm a web developer based in the Philippines. I love creating beautiful and functional websites that provide great user experiences. With a strong background in both front-end and back-end development, I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly web applications using the latest technologies.

## Skills

- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- Front-end frameworks: React, Vue.js
- Back-end technologies: Node.js, Express, PHP
- Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
- Version control: Git, GitHub

## Hobbies

When I'm not coding, I enjoy hiking, photography, and exploring new coffee shops.
